message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is valued at $1200000 to us due to its unique features, superior quality, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. We believe it holds significant potential for enhancing your business operations or personal endeavors. Let's discuss how we can bring this remarkable product to fruition for you.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value and quality of your product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $1200000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your expectations.
